channel.title: [508] Shop! (much info)

item.title: [508] Shop! (much info)
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hello, i have a big problem, how i add my shop :S
the npc i wants to opent he shop = 520
My code.

player.java

public int[] shop15 = {4151, 4151};
public int[] shop15n = {1, 1};

shop.java

public int[] shop15 = {4151, 4151};
public int[] shop15n = {1, 1};

shophandler.java

	case 520: //test
            p.frames.setShop(p, 700); // 700 is the Shop ID
            items = Engine.shops.shop15; // Declaring this from Shops.java
            itemsN = Engine.shops.shop15n; // Declaring this from Shops.java
            p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN); 
            p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64271, 31, items, itemsN);
        	break;

NPCOption1.java

case 520: //construction
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 15;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop15, p.shop15n);
p.frames.setString(p, " Test shop", 278, 88);
break;

What have i missed?

Read full topic
